version_description: Minor changes and improvements.
Minor changes and improvements.
Minor changes and improvements.
Minor changes and improvements.

- UI improvements implemented
- payment card withdrawal alerts added
- the latest price update time reflection

Bugs fixed:
- decimal mark
- disabled Ripple for deposit and withdrawal

- CEX.IO Help Centre connection added
- submission of support requests directly via Zendesk enabled

- Approximate amount calculation for marker orders added
- New BCH addresses supported

- Instant purchase option to buy crypto in few clicks
- XRP/XLM deposits and withdrawals
- Numerous bugs fixed
Minor bugs have been fixed
CAPTCHA bug fixed

- Mandatory email verification added
- Quick and direct access to instant crypto purchases
- UI improvements
- Crashes fix
Minor bugs fixed
Login issues fixed

Device and server time sync check
Approximate buy amount feature

Your last chosen trading pair is shown by default
Mandatory phone confirmation step is added
Limit order for entire balance calculation (just tap on your balance on Limit order page)
Minor changes and fixes
Minor bugs are fixed

Charts for all trade pairs are enabled to allow easy trade on the go. Just proceed to "CEX.IO Market " tab and tap on the preferred trade pair.
Hints: turn your phone horizontally for a better charts display; tap and hold on a candle to see more information.
Trading via the app has become more convenient after we got rid of a few bugs

You asked and we delivered!
Long-awaited order execution push notifications are now enabled in our app.
Simply proceed to the Settings menu in the app and tick on the checkbox to get the notification once your limit order is completed.

You asked and we delivered!
Long-awaited order execution push notifications are now enabled in our app.
Simply proceed to the Settings menu in the app and tick on the checkbox to get the notification once your limit order is completed.

We did some magic to improve the app performance and make your experience a bit more pleasant.
Update your app and enjoy.
Happy trading!

Captcha issue during login and registration fixed.
Minor performance improvements.

Get a better experience of using our app.
Here is what we've got for you:
- Brand new design: the updated visual identity now looks more sophisticated, bright and stylish. Trade smart with the smart-looking app.
- New feature: verification option is now available in our app; submitting the application is faster and more convenient now.
Trade and enjoy!

We rolled out several improvements in this release. Now you can:
- See the spread on the Trade page
- Track your transactions on the blockchain!
A hint: go to the Balance page, tap the cryptocurrency, find the Transaction ID, and click on it for the details.

We've added even more speed and accuracy to the overall app performance in this release.
Hope you will enjoy it even more now.
Happy trading!

We keep on working on delivering you a seamless experience when using the app.
In this update, we shipped a couple of smaller improvements.
Hope you will enjoy them!

Get a better experience of using our app.
Here is what we've got for you:
- Brand new design: the updated visual identity now looks more sophisticated, bright and stylish. Trade smart with the smart-looking app.
- New feature: verification option is now available in our app; submitting the application is faster and more convenient now.
Trade and enjoy!

- Easier access to favorite trade pairs:
Choose the preferred pairs and sort them by your choice.
Star the concerned pair to move it to the "Favorites" folder.
- More convenient trade pairs selection.
- Mandatory verification enabled.
- Enhanced charts view.

We keep on working on providing you with the most convenient trading tool.
This release delivers performance improvement, which also includes a few bugs fixes.
Stay tuned!
Fixed reliability and stability issues.

- Track the market trends with the 24h price change indicator. See the "Market" tab.
- Find out the estimated value of your balance in BTC and USD equivalent. Check your "Balance" tab.
- Generate the referral link straight in your app. Look it up in your "Profile" tab.

- Minor design improvements.
- Overall performance enhancement.
We never stop making our app better for you!
Trade and enjoy!

We keep on working on delivering you a seamless experience when using the app.
In this update, we shipped a couple of smaller improvements.
Hope you will enjoy them!

We keep on working on delivering you a seamless experience when using the app.
In this update, we added Favorites Manager. You can now easily manage your favorite trading pairs.
Hope you will enjoy it.

We've added even more speed and accuracy to the overall app performance in this release.
Hope you will enjoy it even more now.
Happy trading!

Meet price alerts on CEX.IO Mobile App!
To add a price alert:
- Go to Profile, select Price Alert and click on the plus sign
- Or go to Trade or Market tab and hit the bell icon in the upper right corner of the screen.
You can set the alert price or select 24 hours change indicator of your choice.
Click on the alert to edit, deactivate or delete it.

Started to deliver service to US customers!
Improved overall app performance.

This release delivers verification improvements and a few bugs fixes.
Stay tuned for updates!

We rolled out several improvements in this release. Now you can:
- See the spread on the Trade page
- Track your transactions on the blockchain!
A hint: go to the Balance page, tap the cryptocurrency, find the Transaction ID, and click on it for the details.

- Added link to CEX.IO Official Telegram Group. You'll find it in Profile menu. Tap the link to join the group - and stay on the top of updates!
- Also, as usual, we get the work done in improving the app's stability and performance.

- Added info about the type of USDT we’ve just listed. You’ll find it on the Deposit and Withdrawal pages in the mobile app.
- Regular performance optimization to give you the best trading experience.

- New feature! Now you can exchange currencies in one click! Find it in the menu Wallet -> Exchange.
- The Balance menu is renamed to Wallet.
- The Withdrawal option was moved. To find it, go to Wallet and tap on the currency you wish to withdraw.
- Regular performance improvements and fixes.
General improvements and app performance
App performance improvements, bugs fix

New feature!
Sell crypto instantly and top up your VISA or Mastercard in one click.

Simplified access to crypto trading now in mobile app as well.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Instant Exchange service is expanded!
Now you can also convert fiat-to-fiat currencies in one click!
Also we’ve improved and optimized user verification flow.
